pages.text:
Leisure Living at Its Best Our residents regularly gather to enjoy our heated swimming pool, hot tub, shuffleboard courts, horseshoe pits, clubhouse with a ballroom and kitchen, fitness center, card room, library, billiard table, and more. We also have an on-site rental storage area for your trailers, boats, and other vehicles. The Grove, nestled in the city of Bradenton, Florida is ideally located within miles of fabulous beaches, golfing, dining, shopping, hiking, fishing and many other attractions you’ll find on our Activities Page ! We welcome you to contact our office to schedule a tour of our grounds. We’ll make you feel right at home! (941)-877-0997 thegrovesales@legacymhc.com Request Information Upgrades Complete! We are happy to announce that The Grove’s clubhouse upgrades are complete. Now Open! The Grove’s newly renovated fitness center is open. Homes For Sale
